f6_assessments.q0: The idea behind it is interesting. The Vietnamese are starting to gain interest in blockchain lately, including Cardano, and I can personally attest that it’s true based on the number of proposals coming from that region in this fund compared to the previous ones. This is a very good opportunity, and by offering them a hub through platforms such as Facebook, Discord, and Youtube, the proposer aims to provide basic knowledge to the Vietnamese community to get them onboard. That being said, I am a bit disappointed that the proposer has not explicitly mentioned the insights they gained during the previous four months of operation. What can be improved, what can be changed, and how can they engage with the community better? This is very important to analyze and explain because this proposal is targeting 62x their Facebook group size (from 161 to 10,000 members) and 17x their Discord server size (from 118 to 2000 members), so their feedback is crucial in order to successfully reach this huge target.
f6_assessments.q1: When it comes to feasibility, the proposed implementation plan is provided with enough details except in the budget section. The proposer has listed their profiles, and after analyzing them, I saw that the proposer has enough experience talking about blockchain-related content on their Youtube channel. I applaud the proposer’s initiative on elaborating the milestones within their timetable and planning the requested budget based on those milestones. The budget item that revolves around article creation, Youtube video production, and community management is reasonable. However, the marketing campaign might need a lot more justification. Since the proposal’s target is very high, the three marketing campaigns would be vital to the success of the project. As a result, it would be advantageous if the proposer explained that aspect in greater detail, such as what type of medium they would use to promote it and to whom they would market it. As of now, the "how" regarding their marketing campaigns is still vague. I am sure the proposer has some ideas on how to implement it, but I want to heavily emphasize it since the current market situation is bearish, so it is going to be harder to find new members. Another thing that could be improved is the miscellaneous and contingency costs. 1000 USD might be excessive. I would advise the proposer to exhaustively list all their non-fundamental project-related needs, such as the internet data, buffer for ADA fluctuation, etc. It’s going to look more defendable if the budget section is filled with a list of those needs instead of one huge miscellaneous item. In the end, I tend to agree with the current plan mostly because none of it contains any potential significant blockers and the previous four months of operation serve as a good knowledge base for the proposer already.
f6_assessments.q2: The provided information is enough for auditing since a lot of their metrics are publicly available. The roadmap milestones are clear enough and we can objectively determine if those milestones are achieved or not because the proposer provides us with the numbers of articles and videos that are going to be produced. The proposal target is very ambitious too; 5000 subscribers and 100,000 views on Youtube, 10,000 members on Facebook, and 2000 members on Discord. We could easily monitor these numbers, but it’s odd that the proposer targets those numbers after the sixth month because the marketing campaigns only last for three months. Theoretically, once the marketing campaign ends in the third month, the growth would stagnate. I would like to see the proposer's reasoning for this.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposer suggests to continue developing an information hub CEVI to provide basic knowledge, update and analyze information about Crypto in general, especially focusing on the Cardano platform for the Vietnamese community. The particular ways to implement the project is to create short videos on Youtube, share blockchain & Crypto basic knowledge for newbies in Discord & Facebook, analyze investment opportunities and share crypto investment experiences. This project truly addresses the challenges helping Vietnamese community, who passionate about Blockchain and Crypto but face barriers in terms of language and skills, could access the useful information of Cardano. Through these activities, the Cardano values will surely be raised and broaden in scale. The writer has had a comprehensive survey of the population of Blockchain and Crypto in Vietnamese community as well as what is needed for this community to access Cardano value. I evaluate mark 5 for this criteria.
f6_assessments.q1: This project has basis to believe that it will be successful. First, the key person running this project is an investor and community manager with more than 2 years of experience on the Cardano platform. He is the founder of an Youtube channel and many other language clubs, having experience in managing at a design company, having knowledge and ability to connect and work in a team. His skill and experiences are proper to the requirement of running an information hub sharing with Vietnamese Cardano community. Second, the budget is divided into logical items for running the project. The costs include in-depth research articles; scripting, recording, editing a video on Youtube; Admins for Facebook, Discord, Youtube; Marketing; Miscellaneous expenses and contingency costs. The total budget is 1024 USD. Referring the challenges, the author admits that due to the market downtrend, the attention from the community for crypto projects is significantly less. To solve this problem, the proposer suggests to build the information Hub for target community  to bring real value to them, actively promote  on platforms such as Telegram, Facebook, Discord, Twitter to attract more attention from the community. In general, I agree with what he has described. I give mark 5 for this criteria.
f6_assessments.q2: The project has clear schedule to follow. It is estimated to last in 3 months, including: creating basic functions on the Discord channel; preparation for in-depth reviews of projects on the Cardano platform; publishing in-depth reviews for the community, observing community feedback and making appropriate adjustments if needed; opening a marketing campaign on different platforms; publishing videos on Youtube providing basic instructions to the new users or upon request and feedback from the community. The main KPIs for evaluation of success are the increase number of subscribers on Youtube channel, Facebook group and Discord channel. In conclusion, the proposal is clear and easy to understand. The problem solving is good. I evaluate mark 5 for this criteria.
